meta.title: Mashrouk Transport App | Safe Shared Rides & Eco Transport in Saudi Arabia
meta.description: Book safe, shared transport in Saudi Arabia with Mashrouk. Discover eco-friendly rides, secure travel, and seamless booking. Download the app now!

SharingIsBlessing.title: Shared hands bring blessed lands
SharingIsBlessing.subtitle: Book Your Dream Trip In Just A Few Taps, Download Now!

YourRide.title: Your Ride, Your Seat Book in Seconds!
YourRide.subtitle: Experience seamless transportation with our intuitive app
YourRide.description5: and hit the road for a smooth, hassle-free journey. Your next adventure is just a tap away!

WhoWeAre.title: Who we are
WhoWeAre.description: Mashrouk is an intelligent system, introduced from AMK LLC, powered by advanced ai algorithms that allocates shared trips based on predefined criteria and zones, enhancing resource utilization with maximum efficiency.

WhyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyUs.description: We provide Shared rides solutions across all regions with a modern fleet, ensuring a smooth journey to any destination.
WhyUs.feature3: Ride security with Live Camera Tracking

OurFeatures.title: Our Features
OurFeatures.description: Few good reasons why you should use Mashrouk to book your trips easily by selecting your preferred seats.
OurFeatures.feature1Description: Choose your preferred seat ahead of time for added comfort and convenience.
OurFeatures.feature2Description: Save more with our regularly updated promotions and deals!
OurFeatures.feature3Description: We're here to help you with any questions or concerns, whenever you need us.

Testimonials.title: What our happy client say
Testimonials.subtitle: Things that make mashrouk the best
Testimonials.subtitleMobile: Things that make it the best place to start trading

client1.name: Magda Essam
client1.message: Such a convenient app! I can always count on it to get where I need to be. The drivers are friendly, and the rides are comfortable.

client2.name: Abdullah Alshehri
client2.message: Customer support is always responsive and helpful. I had an issue once, and they solved it quickly. Excellent service!

client3.name: Abdulgader Attiah
client3.message: I love how easy it is to share a ride with others. It saves money and the environment at the same time!

Download.title: Love our application?
Download.description: Travel Made Easy â€“ Find, Book, and Explore with Our App!

NotFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.

Footer.description: Providing reliable transport services across the region. We are committed to delivering efficient and safe transportation solutions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By downloading, accessing, or using the Mashrouk mobile application, website, or services, you:
points: Acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by these Terms and Conditions.
Confirm that you comply with all eligibility requirements outlined herein.
acceptance.disclaimer: If you do not agree to these Terms, you must immediately cease using the Service.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.description: The Service is available only to individuals who:
points: Are at least 18 years old.
Possess the legal capacity to enter into contracts under Saudi Arabian law.
Have a valid Saudi national ID/Iqama (for riders/drivers as applicable).

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.description: Mashrouk reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes via:
points: In-app notifications.
Email (if registered).
A prominent notice on our website.
modifications.disclaimer: Continued use of the Service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction & Language
jurisdiction.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
points: Any disputes shall be resolved exclusively in the courts of Riyadh.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
points: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account information
All activities conducted through your account
Compliance with all Saudi laws and regulations while using the Service

rideBooking.title: Ride Booking & Payment
rideBooking.description: Fares are calculated based on distance/time/dynamic pricing
points: Accepted payment methods: Cash, credit cards, POS terminals, Apple Pay
Cancellation policy: Free if canceled within 2 minutes; fee of 10 SAR thereafter

independentDrivers.title: Liability & Safety for Independent Drivers
independentDrivers.description: Drivers are independent contractors; Mashrouk is not liable for accidents/disputes
points: Users must comply with Saudi laws (no drugs, weapons, or harassment)

employedDrivers.title: Liability & Safety for Mashrouk Drivers
points: Ensures all drivers have valid licenses under TGA regulations
Conducts background checks, driver training, and vehicle inspections
Maintains commercial insurance covering vehicle accidents

passengers.title: For Passengers:
points: Wear seatbelts (in accordance with Saudi traffic regulations)
No smoking, alcohol, or prohibited items (weapons, drugs)
Treat drivers with respect; misconduct or damage may result in account closure and legal action

drivers.title: For Drivers:
points: Comply with traffic laws and safety procedures
Report any accidents to Mashrouk immediately

notLiable.title: Mashrouk is not liable for:
points: Delays or cancellations due to force majeure (storms, road closures)
User violations of safety procedures (injuries from not wearing seatbelts)
Loss of personal belongings in vehicles

maxLiability.title: Maximum Liability:
points: Mashrouk's liability for employed drivers is limited to direct damages under labor and insurance laws
Claims must be submitted within 24 hours of the incident

accidentProcedures.title: Accident Procedures
steps: Driver calls emergency services (993/911) if necessary
Report to Mashrouk via app or mashrouk.support@amk.com.sa within 24 hours
Submit police report (required for insurance claims)

serviceTermination.title: Service Termination
serviceTermination.description: Mashrouk may suspend accounts for terms violations (fraud, safety risks).

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: Disputes shall be resolved under Saudi law, in the courts of Riyadh

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Last updated: July 2, 2025
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: Mashrouk ("we," "us," or "our") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our app and services.

provided.title: a. Information You Provide
points: Name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you create an account or use our services.
Feedback, ratings, and communications with customer support.

automatic.title: b. Information We Collect Automatically
points: Device information (model, OS, unique identifiers).
Location data (if you allow location access).
Usage data (features used, session times, crash logs).

thirdParty.title: c. Information from Third Parties
points: If you sign in via third-party services (e.g., Google, Facebook), we receive information as permitted by your settings.

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
points: Provide and improve Mashrouk's services.
Process payments and facilitate rides or deliveries.
Communicate about your account, services, and updates.
Ensure safety and security for users and partners.
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

howWeShare.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
points: Service providers (payment processors, customer support).
Drivers or partners to fulfill your requests.
Legal authorities when required by law.
howWeShare.note: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

choicesRights.title: 4. Your Choices and Rights
points: Access & Update: You can view and edit your information in your account settings.
Delete Account: You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time via the app or by visiting our Account Deletion Page.
Location Permissions: You may enable or disable location access in your device settings.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.description: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data, but no system is completely secure.

retention.title: 6. Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your data only as long as necessary to provide services and comply with legal obligations. If we must retain certain data for security, fraud prevention, or regulatory reasons, we will clearly inform you.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.description: Mashrouk is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy. Significant changes will be posted here and, where appropriate, notified to you.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: For questions or concerns about this policy, contact us at:
contact.deletionRequest: Request for Account Deletion: Send a request to delete your account and personally identifiable information (PII) that is stored on our systems.

types.title: Types of Cookies Used
types.analytics: Analytics: Google Analytics for app performance.

consent.title: Consent
consent.management: Users can manage preferences via app settings/browser.
consent.newUsers: First-time users see a pop-up banner to accept/reject non-essential cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: List partners and links to their policies.
